body.p:
To uninstall the deployment, execute the following command:sudo bash /fusion/admin/uninstall-content-fusion.sh
The uninstaller will not delete the configuration, user profiles, or review tasks from the disk.
To remove the configuration, user profiles, and review tasks from the disk, run the uninstall command with the -p flag.
A backup should be created beforehand if that data is still needed in the future.
